page.title: 08Computers
page.content:
{Computers} became more popular in l983, when the number of people increased rapidly. Seventy children in our school have home computers used mainly for games. The most popular is the{ZX Spectrum}possibly because it has a wide range of games and is easy to operate. The least popular are the{Oric}and the{Aquarius possibly because they are more expensive and haven's got as wide a range of games as the{Spectrum. { Very few of the adults we interviewed use a computer in their work. The ones who do, use them for storing information.
Our school has three computers. The Disc Drive for the BBC is an economical way to load programs.
